casebody.data:
PEOPLE of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Andre Monteek EDWARDS, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 157881
COA: 341475 Supreme Court of Michigan. June 11, 2018

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of defendant-appellant to file an application for leave to appeal in excess of the page limitation is GRANTED. The 60-page application submitted on June 1, 2018, is accepted for filing.
